g.text: Mahatma Gandhi”discussionThread AGandhiJayanti: Twitter Unveils New Feature on Bapu's Birthday. In order to celebrate the birth anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi, Twitter has decided to launch a unique emoji and has dedicated it to Gandhi.1.Films inspired by the life of Mahatma Gandhi.As the whole country is gearing up to celebrate the 150th Birth Anniversary ofGandhi, on Tuesday, October 2, these are the movies one can watch to commemorate the great Indian leader.1.1. Mahatma Gandhi’s 150th birth year celebrations begin in India. The culmination of Swachhatahi Seva Campaign and MGISC marked the start of the 150th birth year celebrations of Mahatma Gandhi.2.Mahatma Gandhi's 150th Birth Anniversary: India Organises'Gandhi March' to Mark International Day of Non-Violence in Netherlands. Participants wore T-shirts specially designed for the occasion with the logo 'Follow the Mahatma' and a picture of Gandhiji. Thread B1.Gandhi Jayanti: Twitter Unveils New Feature on Bapu's Birthday. In order to celebrate the birth anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi, Twitter has decided to launch a unique emoji and has dedicated it to Gandhi.2.Films inspired by the life of Mahatma Gandhi. As the whole country is gearing up to celebrate the 150th Birth Anniversary ofGandhi, on Tuesday, October 2, these are the movies one can watch to commemorate the great Indian leader.3.Mahatma Gandhi’s 150th birth year celebrations begin in India. The culmination of Swachhatahi Seva Campaign and MGISC marked the start of the 150th birth year celebrations of Mahatma Gandhi.4.In pictures: Mahatma Gandhi's 150th birth anniversary. India observes October 2 as Gandhi's birth anniversary and as the International Day of non-violence, an idea Gandhi championed. But this time, the police turned violent on a farmers' march to Delhi.
